Visited the "Eurasia" branch at Lesi Ukrainky Boulevard 19 on June 5, 2025. While waiting, we noticed a cockroach near the food pickup area ‚Äî very close to the kitchen. This seriously raised concerns about hygiene.

We contacted the company via their official email, but it's been a week and we haven‚Äôt received any response. It's disappointing, especially since we used to be regular customers and previously had a good impression of the service.

We hope the management will address this issue and take proper sanitation measures.
